title: The Coronation of Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth the Second 2nd June 1953
brief_description: A highlight compilation of Queen Elizabeth’s coronation on the 2nd of June 1953. Commences with Queen Elizabeth’s journey through London and her arrival at Westminster Abbey. Shows her entrance to the Abbey, and highlights of the coronation service including receiving the ‘ord’ and being ‘crowned’. Follows the procession back to Buckingham Palace and the Queen and her family greeting her ‘subjects’ from the palace balcony. Finally, the flight of jet fighters over Buckingham Palace completes the occasion.
